channel.title: How Do I Get Him To Come Down
channel.description: ok one of my characters went up stairs in my server and now he cant come down how do i get him down?

item.title: How Do I Get Him To Come Down
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

[quote=“xxDiluted2xx, post:9, topic:278740”]Here is a command to get your height back to 0. It SHOULD work. Most servers do.

if (command.startsWith("ground")) { teleportToX = 3248; teleportToY = 9364; heightLevel = 0; }

It’s a commands, again. Add it to your commands in the Client.Java file ofcourse. Any problems, come back to this topic.[/quote]

Maybe set it so it uses the current location as not everybody uses the same source and tele spots might be different… blablabla, you get the point. :Dµ

Like this: (i’m not 100% sure tho.)


   if (command.startsWith("ground")) {
       		teleportToX = p.absX;
        	teleportToY = p.absY;
		heightLevel = 0;
	    }

actually i’m not sure if this will work with your source, cause i don’t know how to get your own coords on a 317…
for a 508 it would be more simple, also tell us what source you’re using next time.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Get Him To Come Down

item.title: How Do I Get Him To Come Down
item.dc:creator: @toomuchmopar toomuchmopar
item.description:
@toomuchmopar wrote:

haxifix:

ok one of my characters went up stairs in my server and now he cant come down how do i get him down?

if its mopars’ source. do ::godown (and if ladders wont work u can do ::goup to skip them)

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Get Him To Come Down
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

Here is a command to get your height back to 0. It SHOULD work. Most servers do.

if (command.startsWith("ground")) { teleportToX = 3248; teleportToY = 9364; heightLevel = 0; }

It’s a commands, again. Add it to your commands in the Client.Java file ofcourse. Any problems, come back to this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Get Him To Come Down
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“labeeb, post:3, topic:278740”]u can go to ::slayer and find a ladder that takes u down
…[/quote]

That won’t work in all servers. Since not all servers will have a slayer command as well they may not have the code for a ladder there.

Anyways, log off the account. Goto the accounts profile file, and open it up. Change the heightLevel to 0, File -> Save. Close the file, and log back in.

Read full topic
